TopicTitle: A workaround for the greyed out PD launcher on non 100% scaling monitors

Articles.Content:
I have a 2 monitor setup, 27 inch 1440p one with 100% scaling and a 16 inch 1600p one with 125% scaling.

PD launcher doesn't seem to work very well on the 16 inch monitor, most likely due to non 100% scaling.

To fix that:

  1. Start the launcher
  2. Open Task Manager, search for "PD launcher"
  3. Pick either of the 6 processes.
  4. Right click -> Go to file location, should take you to "C:\Users\%username%\AppData\Local\PD Launcher\app-<latest pd launcher version>"
  5. Right click on the t2gp executable -> Properties -> Compatibility -> Change high DPI settings
  6. Check "Override high DPI scaling behavior..."
  7. Set it to "System (Enchanced)" or "System"
  8. Click OK, then OK again.
  9. Restart the launcher.
